metadata.name: Play for peace #2
metadata.description:
'Play for Peace', is a solidary NFT artwork collection that rises over the necessity of superimposing the values linked to sports before any war, seeking to connect athletes and sports lovers through a strong message of peace.
We have no doubt that the power of the Shirtum community is immense. We are convinced that with your support we can help in one way or another to all the people who are suffering from this unfair situation.
The revenue generated from this drop will be donated in 100% to the International Committee of the Red Cross in support of the refugees affected by the current conflict.
We can all join this cause; sport unites in a symbol for peace.
